revised_title: On the Method of Determining Contingent Reversions in Three-Lives Survivorship
tldr: The author, William Morgan, presents a method for determining the value of contingent reversions involving three lives in survivorship. He investigates the probabilities and values of annuities related to different contingencies and provides formulas for calculating the value of the reversion in various scenarios. This work contributes to the field of actuarial science and life insurance.
